## getIn variable

Immediate use getter, i.e. same as: `getter(path)(state)`<!-- -->.

```ts
getIn({a: {b: {c: 23}}}, "a.b.c");
// 23

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getIn: (state: any, path: Path) => any
```
